titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Mr. Becerra demanded that the question be divided on the adoption of the resolution so as to have a separate vote on the election of the Chaplain. Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to that portion electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
1/6/2015--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Karen L. Haas as Clerk, (2) Paul D. Irving as Sergeant at Arms, (3) Ed Cassidy as Chief Administrative Officer, and (4) Father Patrick J. Conroy as Chaplain.
